name: TWILIGHT FOODIE DELIGHT  with HUE VESPA TOUR
description:
The old imperial
capital of Hue is popular not only for its attractive historical monuments of
the Nguyen Dynasty but also for its richness in culture and cuisine. There's no
better way to explore the night life of Hue and its tasteful flavours than
sitting on the back seat of a vespa for an adventure through charming streets.
Our Twilight Foodie Delight offers great chance for visitors to get the best of
what Hue has to offer in terms of gastronomy and local culture.
